2007 from accord publishing finished size approx 21 circumference designed to fit adult head up to 24 materials 3oz/85g 1 skein lion brand wool-ease in seaspray j-10 6mm hook gauge 15 sts 10 row = 4 in half_double_crochet abbreviations american english crochet terms beg - beginning bpdc - back post double_crochet chain - chain fpdc - front post double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet repeat - repeat round - round single_crochet - single_crochet single_crochet decrease - single_crochet decrease worked over next two stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch st sts - stitch stitches ws - wrong side yo - yarn over brim make 2 row 1 chain 31 turn single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across 30 single_crochet row 2 chain 2 turn counts as first
